title: Team recruitment
body:
Hey guys,
I am a gold 3 player.

I am currently looking others to join my ranked team. So that we can get to gold ranked for season 6.  If you guys is seeking a ranked team just feel free to leave your IGN name below.

I hope you at least silver player and willing to contribute for team.

I will organise some trial game hopefully tonight.

Please, feel free to add me if you think I'd slot into your team

replies.body:
IGN: iHex
Rank: Silver 2
Role: Any
Communication: Skype, Curse, Teamspeak

Sounds fun, I play everyday.
IGN: Xern
Rank: Silver 3
Role: Any
Voice Coms: Any

Ugh, I'd be willing to give it a try :)
Haven't got proper gear for voice communication, though can get skype etc..

Silver V - Don't play ranked much to be honest.
Not the best player either :)

Sup/Mid/Jg/Top/Adc pref.

EDIT: Guess my IGN.
